post1.title: Regulation
post1.summary: The Data Protection Authority (DPA) regulates and oversees data protection in Somalia, making sure organisations handle personal data responsibly.

post2.title: Awareness Campaigns
post2.summary: We run campaigns, training, and outreach to help people and organisations understand data-protection principles.

post3.title: Enforcement & Compliance
post3.summary: We enforce the rules, hold organisations accountable, and build public trust in how sensitive data is handled.
